thread.title: Kate Upton named Sports Illustrated swimsuit cover girl
thread.title_full: Kate Upton named Sports Illustrated swimsuit cover girl

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Kate Upton named Sports Illustrated swimsuit cover girl
text:
Kate Upton named Sports Illustrated swimsuit cover girl for third time Kate Upton named Sports Illustrated swimsuit cover girl Kate Upton is the cover model for Sports Illustrated's 2017 swimsuit editon. (Sports Illustrated) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Wednesday, February 15, 2017, 12:47 AM 
Kate Upton is showing off all her attributes as the new Sports Illustrated Swimsuit cover girl. 
The blond bombshell covers three different versions of the magazine, photographed by Yu Tsai in Fiji. 
One cover shows Upton in white bikini bottoms with a metallic jacket. Another shows her in a strappy one-piece and the third features gypsy-style bikini bottoms and an elaborate necklace. 
Upton debuted in the magazine in 2011, then graced the cover in both 2012 and 2013. 
In 2016, Sports Illustrated featured three cover models: Ashley Graham, Ronda Rousey and Hailey Clauson. 
"I was very excited when (editor MJ Day) asked me to be back in the issue. Especially when this year's theme is about every woman of every age and every body type being accepted. It was inspiring to be asked to be a part of that issue," Upton said . The 2017 SI Swimsuit Covers have been revealed. Welcome back, @KateUpton ! Follow the link for more photos and video https://t.co/4cszjybbVp pic.twitter.com/y7TguJdPVD — SI Swimsuit (@SI_Swimsuit) February 15, 2017 
"For me, it was MJ’s passion for having it be this theme and this issue and that’s why I wanted to be a part of this magazine again. Those are the campaigns I want to do and the career I want to have — to inspire women to love themselves. That’s a balance of working hard and eating healthy but also enjoying life and having cheat days and for the emphasis not to be on the ideal perfect body. It makes me proud to be asked back." 
She found out about her cover just a day before the announcement, she told Kimmel. Upton also covered the magazine in 2012 and 2013. (Jordan Strauss/Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) 
“It's a full circle moment for us,” Day said . 
“We started Kate in her career, and you know, we watched her grow and become not only this worldwide, superstar phenomenon; she changed the direction of the modeling industry. Kate Upton was really this trailblazer that lead the way for the Ashley Grahams of the world and everything you're seeing happen that's different in fashion right now.” Join the Conversation:
